description: View multiple (a list of) deal pipelines.
name: deal_pipeline_list

filters.description: See below code example for all filters you can pass.

full.description: Whether or not to return ALL data, or an abbreviated portion (set to 1 for ALL data, and 0 for abbreviated).

page.description: Pagination: results are limited to 20 per page, so specify what page to view.

sort.description: Field to sort on (possible values: id, datetime).

sort_direction.description: Direction of sort (possible values: ASC or DESC).
